title: How to add ZKPs to your app with Zupass
description:
Zupass makes it easier for anyone to build applications that use ZK proofs, even with no prior experience in ZK cryptography. Learn how you can use the Zupass SDK to create, store, and retrieve cryptographic data, and make ZK proofs that can be shared and consumed by other applications.

This workshop will be an introductory dive into the Zupass SDK, with hands-on examples and practical steps to get started.
